mapper.sql: roomid, roomnum, customerid, reserveid, floor, type, price, state, isreservation, reservationtime, arrive, deposit, instructions, ex1, ex2, ex3, ex4, ex5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from room
order by ${orderByClause}
select roomid from room where roomnum = #{roomnum }
select roomid from room where customerid = #{customerid }
select state from room where roomid = #{roomid }
mapper.insert: insert into room (roomid, roomnum, customerid, reserveid, floor, type, price, state, isreservation, reservationtime, arrive, deposit, instructions, ex1, ex2, ex3, ex4, ex5) values (#{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reserveid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isreservation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{arrive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instructions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ex1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ex2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ex3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ex4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ex5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
